name: Lernen Chennai
description: Lernen is the new version of our company, which was established in 2019 with the support of young talents. We are a team of training experts who share a common vision to make a difference in training and development. Together, we designed and planned what should come after the training delivery. Our 3i Strategy has enabled us to attract international clients from the UK, US, Hong Kong, and Mexico. At Lernen, our aim is to become a one-stop solution for training and development for businesses of all sizes. Despite having a decade of experience across multiple industries, we continue to follow the same 3i logic, delivering results with unwavering enthusiasm. We are headquartered in Chennai and provide training across the globe, with a mission to drive change in performance, people, and lives.
features: We monitor and evaluate every phase. We project the results visually in people. Our post training always ensures results in the long run.
We upgrade our trainers to meet the requirements. We adhere to our motto of Creativity Vs Connectivity. We design the module to seek difference. We help unlearn & learn new.
We follow a 360-degree approach to fetch results. Audio and Visual material provided at every phase. We sow the seed of urge in every individual for transformation.
Headline: “beyond just training”
ShortDescription: Lernen believe in “beyond just training”. We look at training as not only a way to develop professional skills but also to holistically develop yourself. O
